title: Apply a stash
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to use Git stash to temporarily save changes, switch to another branch, and then apply the stashed changes to continue working on your original branch.

meta.title: Apply a Stash: Git Playground Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to temporarily save changes and switch to another branch in Git with the stash feature.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, stash, branch, git, feature, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful application
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 应用贮藏
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将学习如何使用 Git 贮藏来临时保存更改，切换到另一个分支，然后应用贮藏的更改以继续在原始分支上工作。

meta.title: 应用贮藏：Git 实践教程
meta.description: 了解如何使用 Git 的贮藏功能临时保存更改并切换到另一个分支。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, Git 实验室, 贮藏, 分支, Git, 功能, Git 实践

verify.name: 验证应用是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
